title: Linear Regression with Sparsity Example
description: This lab demonstrates how to perform linear regression with sparsity using the diabetes dataset from scikit-learn. We will fit only two features of the dataset and plot the results to illustrate the concept of sparsity.

meta.title: Linear Regression with Sparsity | Diabetes Dataset | Scikit-learn
meta.description: Learn how to perform linear regression with sparsity using the diabetes dataset from scikit-learn. Explore feature selection and model visualization.
meta.keywords: linear regression, sparsity, diabetes dataset, scikit-learn, feature selection, model visualization

i18n.title: 带稀疏性的线性回归示例
i18n.description: 本实验展示了如何使用scikit-learn中的糖尿病数据集进行带稀疏性的线性回归。我们将仅拟合数据集中的两个特征，并绘制结果以说明稀疏性的概念。

meta.title: 带稀疏性的线性回归 | 糖尿病数据集 | Scikit-learn
meta.description: 学习如何使用scikit-learn中的糖尿病数据集进行带稀疏性的线性回归。探索特征选择和模型可视化。
meta.keywords: 线性回归, 稀疏性, 糖尿病数据集, Scikit-learn, 特征选择, 模型可视化
